TestCaseMetaData.name: EDOS_2.1_3.1-M04_NG_M04_Update_add
TestCaseMetaData.Description:
The originator of the eDOS is the Century Hospital Clinical Laboratory located at 2070 Test Park, Los Angeles, CA, 90067, CLIA: 24D9871327 , phone number: (310) 461-3666. The Sender is the Century Hospital Clinical Laboratory LIS. The Receiver is Dr. Radon's Office EHR.
The Laboratory Test Compendium from Century Hospital Clinical Laboratory is a subset of their Directory of Services. It based upon the most commonly ordered lab tests by Dr. Radon. This compendium is being used by Dr. Nicholas Radon's practice EHR to place orders electronically to Century Hospital's Clinical Laboratory. Century Hospital has made changes to their test compendium: - Added CPT codes for the Stool culture with susceptibility reflex - Added CPT codes for the susceptibility panel - Added CPT codes for the individually orderable stool culture
Century Hospital's LIS transmits the appropriate eDOS update message with these changes to Dr. Radon's EHR.
TestCaseMetaData.PreCondition: EDOS_1.0_1.1-M08_New and EDOS_1.0_2.1-M10_New and EDOS_1.0_3.1-M04_New and EDOS_2.1_1.1-M08_Update_Add and EDOS_2.1_2.1-M10_Update_Add
TestCaseMetaData.TestObjectives: Demonstrate capability to support a M04 update message - action: addition.
TestCaseMetaData.Comments: Update changes for addition of charge codes (CPT codes) for individually orderable tests as well as the new panels.
